description: Applies a machine learning model to a data cube of input features and returns the predicted probability values.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data cube containing the input features.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A ML model that was trained with one of the ML training processes such as ``ml_fit_regr_random_forest()``.

returns.description: A data cube with the predicted probability values. It removes the specified dimensions and adds new dimension for the predicted values. It has the name `predictions` and is of type `other`. If a single value is returned, the dimension has a single label with name `0`.
